messages.subject: Re: Kim
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kim, Welcome to the list!!  We are in the SE part of the state.. near Cape Girardeau! We may not be too far away from each other! Most of my materials..I ve
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kim,
Welcome to the list!! We are in the SE part of the state.. near Cape
Girardeau! We may not be too far away from each other!
Most of my materials..I've already sold. I listed it yesterday and already
generated about 40 emails..WOW! It was a mish mosh of stuff mostly. It's so
'freeing' to be getting rid of all the schoolish junk!! We are a total
unschooling family now..and its wonderful. Took us 8 years to get here tho..
Ha.,
Email me if you wish.
Julie in MO

>Also, Julie, what type of material do you have? I am
>in Missouri too. Where are you located? I am about
>35- 40 miles south of St. Louis.
